card.name: Tempered Steel
card.text: Artifact creatures you control get +2/+2.

card.name: Throne of Geth
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Proliferate.

card.name: Thrummingbird
card.text: Flying Whenever Thrummingbird deals combat damage to a player, proliferate.

card.name: Tower of Calamities
card.text: {8}, {T}: Tower of Calamities deals 12 damage to target creature.

card.name: Trigon of Corruption
card.text: Trigon of Corruption enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it. {B}{B}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Trigon of Corruption. {2}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Trigon of Corruption: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Trigon of Infestation
card.text: Trigon of Infestation enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it. {G}{G}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Trigon of Infestation. {2}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Trigon of Infestation: Put a 1/1 green Insect creature token with infect onto the battlefield.

card.name: Trigon of Mending
card.text: Trigon of Mending enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it. {W}{W}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Trigon of Mending. {2}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Trigon of Mending: Target player gains 3 life.

card.name: Trigon of Rage
card.text: Trigon of Rage enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it. {R}{R}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Trigon of Rage. {2}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Trigon of Rage: Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Trigon of Thought
card.text: Trigon of Thought enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it. {U}{U}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Trigon of Thought. {2}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Trigon of Thought: Draw a card.

card.name: Trinket Mage
card.text: When Trinket Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: True Conviction
card.text: Creatures you control have double strike and lifelink.

card.name: Tumble Magnet
card.text: Tumble Magnet enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Tumble Magnet: Tap target artifact or creature.

card.name: Tunnel Ignus
card.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, if that player had another land enter the battlefield under his or her control this turn, Tunnel Ignus deals 3 damage to that player.

card.name: Turn Aside
card.text: Counter target spell that targets a permanent you control.

card.name: Turn to Slag
card.text: Turn to Slag deals 5 damage to target creature. Destroy all Equipment attached to that creature.

card.name: Twisted Image
card.text: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Untamed Might
card.text: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn.

card.name: Vault Skyward
card.text: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Untap it.

card.name: Vector Asp
card.text: {B}: Vector Asp gains infect until end of turn.

card.name: Vedalken Certarch
card.text: Metalcraft - {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land. Activate this ability only if you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Venser, the Sojourner
card.text: +2: Exile target permanent you own. Return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step. -1: Creatures can't be blocked this turn. -8: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, exile target permanent."

card.name: Venser's Journal
card.text: You have no maximum hand size. At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life for each card in your hand.

card.name: Vigil for the Lost
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, you may pay {X}. If you do, you gain X life.

card.name: Viridian Revel
card.text: Whenever an artifact is put into an opponent's graveyard from the battlefield, you may draw a card.

card.name: Volition Reins
card.text: Enchant permanent When Volition Reins enters the battlefield, if enchanted permanent is tapped, untap it. You control enchanted permanent.

card.name: Vulshok Heartstoker
card.text: When Vulshok Heartstoker enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Vulshok Replica
card.text: {1}{R}, Sacrifice Vulshok Replica: Vulshok Replica deals 3 damage to target player.

card.name: Wall of Tanglecord
card.text: Defender {G}: Wall of Tanglecord gains reach until end of turn.

card.name: Whitesun's Passage
card.text: You gain 5 life.

card.name: Wing Puncture
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying.

card.name: Withstand Death
card.text: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Wurmcoil Engine
card.text: Deathtouch, lifelink When Wurmcoil Engine dies, put a 3/3 colorless Wurm artifact creature token with deathtouch and a 3/3 colorless Wurm artifact creature token with lifelink onto the battlefield.
